verbs.description: Every one [V: would] love a puff piece written about them , and Pete Vernon wrote a very puffy piece on CNN 's Brian Stelter for the Columbia Journalism Review . The article 's theme was Stelter was a strictly fact - based objective journalist forced into editorializing by Donald Trump 's war on the facts and truth . It 's like one of those Apple vs. Banana ads , a perfect CNN infomercial .
